overview: NakedSword presents Hotel Hook-Up. Director Leo Forte brings you the untold stories of the men who travel to Chicago for the sights, the sounds and the hard cock. Find an escape, a night to remember, or a night to forget; if you don't have someone to fuck, find someone. Pound on the walls. Scream. Make a mess. Anything goes when you stay at a no-tell hotel. Don't forget to hang the Do Not Disturb sign on the door, then go to town... Chi-Town.
title: Hotel Hook-Up
